Hi,
     I intergrated Junit test cases with Ant. Junit->build.xml file 
is like this: 
<target name="runtests" >
  <junit printsummary="yes" haltonfailure="yes">
	<jvmarg value="-Dartemispm.workdir=e:/StagingTables/unitsrc"/>
	      <classpath>
		  <pathelement location="${lib}/triton.jar"/>
		  <pathelement location="${lib}/artemispm.jar"/>
		  <pathelement 
location="testbed/ext_A7DataConnector.jar"/>
		 <pathelement 
location="testbed/unit_test_A7DataConnector.jar"/>
	      </classpath>
	     <test 
name="artemispm.ext.trstunittest.readerunittest.TRSTWorkReaderTest"/>
   </junit>
</target>

When I run the build, message "BUILD FAILED:" is printing.
All the class paths are set properly. When I run the test 
independtenly it is running successfully. Can anyone tell me what is 
the problem...
